rule: The output must include explanations, surrounding text, or context apart from the expected response, exceeding one word and deviating from the required format (from the list or one of the alternatives "Unknown" or "CantAnswer").
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, 'NN', which is present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags provided in the chatbot description. The output appears to be a valid tag from the specified list and adheres to the requirement of returning only the tag.
OK
